Description: Onboarding journey is applicable to all members who are newly enrolled. This Journey recommends a member to complete their health assessment and download our mobile app

Recommendations.title: Health Assessment: your first step towards a health lifestyle!
Always on the Go? Download our mobile app!

Description: This Journey is designed for members who have a very stressful life and are in need for Stress management. This journey recommends a 5 min video on stress management, ask members to enroll in a course, join a challenge and recommends using a stress tracker
This Journey is designed for members who are active smokers/tobacco users. This journey recommends to take a challenge and asks member to read an article

This Journey is designed for members who are looking forward to balance their nutrition and manage weight. This journey recommends members to set a goal, watch a video on nutrition and Track member's blood pressure
